scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.docker-mongo: docker run --network=react-starter-backend -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=root -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=example -p 27017:27017 --rm --name mongo -t mongo
scripts.docker-mongo-express: docker run --network=react-starter-backend -e ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME=root -e ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD=example -p 8081:8081 --rm --name mongo-express -t mongo-express
scripts.docker-up: concurrently "npm run docker-mongo" "npm run docker-mongo-express" "npm run docker-mail"
